definition: the China Seas (the seas of the Western Pacific Ocean, around China: Bohai Sea, Yellow Sea, East China Sea, South China Sea)
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Hai3 yang2 Shi2 you2 Zong3 gong1 si1

sentences.english: You might as well jck off to fulfill your dream of owning the S China Sea.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以自己實踐擁有南中國海的美夢。

sentences.english: Port Shelter is an important harbor connecting Hong Kong and South China Sea.
sentences.chinese: 牛尾海是連接香港陸地和南中國海的重要通道。

sentences.english: It/s merchandize passes on the South China Sea to Europe and middle east.
sentences.chinese: 他們的商品也要經南中國海抵達歐洲和中東。

sentences.english: It is located at the center zone of Yalong Bay, facing south Chinese ocean.
sentences.chinese: 坐落於亞龍海中心地帶，面朝南中國海，風景宜人。

sentences.english: Now, China is pressing territorial claims in the South China Sea.
sentences.chinese: 現在，中國正聲索其在南中國海領土主權。

sentences.english: Chinese Customs officials also declined to comment Thursday.
sentences.chinese: 中國海關官員週四也拒絕作出評論。

sentences.english: This is the core problem in the South China Sea.
sentences.chinese: 這就是南中國海的核心問題所在。

sentences.english: The captain was taken into custody in early September off the disputed Diaoyu Islands in the East China Sea.
sentences.chinese: 船長九月初，在東中國海有爭議的釣魚魚被拘留。

sentences.english: The offshore self-managed oilfields of the China Offshore Oil oration shall implement the Circular in accordance with thee-mentioned stipulations.
sentences.chinese: 中國海洋石油總公司海上自營油田比照上述規定執行。

sentences.english: The Philippines just demanded the South China Sea be called "the Philippine Sea.
sentences.chinese: 菲律賓只是要求將南中國海改稱爲“菲律賓海”。

sentences.english: A! simple mindedness to the bottom of the South China Sea.
sentences.chinese: 還有你們這些弱智一起炸沉到南中國海海底。

sentences.english: Where no maritime supervision section has been established therein, the work shall be implemented by the maritime administration department on the same level.
sentences.chinese: 未設中國海監機構的，由本級海洋行政主管部門實施。

sentences.english: Chen said that the South China Sea was the first issue he raised with Adm.
sentences.chinese: 陳炳德說，南中國海是他向穆倫提出的第一個問題。

sentences.english: China claims the entire South China Sea.
sentences.chinese: 中國稱整個南中國海都歸其所有。

sentences.english: The ship beat about, and headed for South China Sea.
sentences.chinese: 這艘船改變航向，朝南中國海駛去。

sentences.english: What are China’s territorial rights in the South China Sea?
sentences.chinese: 中國在南中國海的領土權是什麼？

definition: to turn a deaf ear to (idiom); to pretend not to hear

pinyin: Xiang1 gang3 Hong2 Shi2 zi4 hui4

definition: organizing committee/abbr. to 組委|组委

definition: to join an alliance/admission to the United Nations
Ministry of Housing and Urban-Rural Development of the PRC (MOHURD)/abbr. to 住建部[Zhu4 Jian4 bu4]

definition: Kaesong or Gaeseong city in southwest North Korea, close to the border with South Korea and a special economic zone for South Korean companies
